argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latlej.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latlej.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | latlej.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_latpos | |- ( K e. Lat -> K e. Poset ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> K e. Poset ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> Y e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr3 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> Z e. B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( meet ` K ) = ( meet ` K ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 11 | 1, 3, 9, 10, 6, 7 | #P_latcl2 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ /\ <. X , Y >. e. dom ( meet ` K ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 12 | #P_joinle | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Z /\ Y .<_ Z ) <-> ( X .\/ Y ) .<_ Z ) ) |
